content.html: Neurodivergent people deserve a lot better public behaviour from @TalkTV presenters. You could have had your go at Greta without resorting to using her autism as a pejorative. But you did. And you should say sorry for doing that.
content.value: Neurodivergent people deserve a lot better public behaviour from @TalkTV presenters. You could have had your go at Greta without resorting to using her autism as a pejorative. But you did. And you should say sorry for doing that.
